name: Stranger Helix
description:
Created for AdvXJam 2020 using RPG Maker MV.

An offer made. A pocket found. In search of a Prime Item, Magpie and her living tool Bellwether go into the dark.

Stranger Helix is a weird first-person dungeon crawler inspired by games like Baroque and Shin Megami Tensei: Strange Journey. Dodge mysterious anomalies haunting a two-faced labyrinth. Collect items and read their thoughts. Equip Strong Items to learn new abilities. Put up with Bellwether's insults. Identify the Prime Item.

>>  CONTROLS <<

  • Up/Down Arrow Keys - Move
  • Left/Right Arrow Keys - Turn
  • Z / Enter - Confirm / Interact
  • X / Escape - Cancel / Open Menu
  • Spacebar - Wait for a Turn

>> CREDITS <<

  • Isiah Brighton (programmer/composer/Kingdom Hearts expert)
